motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • February 12, 2024 meeting minutes • Contract extension with Blount Construction for 2024 pavement resurfacing • Purchase of two surveillance video trailers • Contract amendment No. 2 with Jacobs for Finance and Administrative Services • Funding authorization for Donaldson Bannister Park engineering analysis

motions.title: Request for Five Additional Personnel for Police Department
motions.description: Approval of request for five additional personnel for the Dunwoody Police Department.

motions.title: 2024 Budget Amendment for Additional Police Personnel and EMS Funding
motions.description: Approval of 2024 budget amendment for additional police personnel and EMS funding.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for legal discussion.
